title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe a characteristic of the electoral process that led to Ross Perot not winning any electoral votes. The response must include a reference to the scenario.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how the result of the electoral process described in part A could affect future third-party or independent candidates running for president.

For Task C, the response must explain how the electoral process described in the scenario affects democratic participation.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
